languages.text: "Если пьянящее чуство великодушия не очаровывает вас, о шерин, я еще раз напомню о более низменных, но не менее значительных вещах. Сеть моих хладных торговцев рассыпалась оттого, что кто-то засунул в настроенный механизм лом и хорошенько им повертел. Если лом не вытащить, то и сеть не восстановится. И все ресурсы и усилия, что вы вложили в мое дело, будут навсегда утеряны".

traits.locale_text: "Если пьянящее чуство великодушия не очаровывает вас, о шерин, я еще раз напомню о более низменных, но не менее значительных вещах. Сеть моих хладных торговцев рассыпалась оттого, что кто-то засунул в настроенный механизм лом и хорошенько им повертел. Если лом не вытащить, то и сеть не восстановится. И все ресурсы и усилия, что вы вложили в мое дело, будут навсегда утеряны".

languages.text: "If the intoxicating feeling of your own magnanimity isn't enthralling enough, shereen, I will remind you of more mundane but no less significant concerns. My network of Cold Traders is falling apart because someone threw a spanner in my well-oiled machine, and then a few more for good measure. If we do not remove these obstructions, the network will not recover. And all the resources and effort you have invested in my business will have gone down the drain."
languages.original_text: "Если пьянящее чуство великодушия не очаровывает вас, о шерин, я еще раз напомню о более низменных, но не менее значительных вещах. Сеть моих хладных торговцев рассыпалась оттого, что кто-то засунул в настроенный механизм лом и хорошенько им повертел. Если лом не вытащить, то и сеть не восстановится. И все ресурсы и усилия, что вы вложили в мое дело, будут навсегда утеряны".

"If the intoxicating feeling of your own magnanimity isn't enthralling enough, shereen, I will remind you of more mundane but no less significant concerns. My network of Cold Traders is falling apart because someone threw a spanner in my well-oiled machine, and then a few more for good measure. If we do not remove these obstructions, the network will not recover. And all the resources and effort you have invested in my business will have gone down the drain."

languages.text: 「アンタ自身の雅量のある言動の陶酔感が夢中になるほどでないって言うなら、もっとありふれてるけど、同じく重要な懸念を思い出させてやるよ。誰かがアタシのよく油を塗った機械にスパナーを投げ込んだから、アタシのコールド・トレーダーのネットワークは壊れつつある。それからさらに、何本かのスパナが念のために投げ込まれた。この障害物を取り除かない限り、ネットワークは回復しない。そして、アンタがアタシのビジネスに投資したすべてのリソースと労力は無駄になる」
languages.original_text: "If the intoxicating feeling of your own magnanimity isn't enthralling enough, shereen, I will remind you of more mundane but no less significant concerns. My network of Cold Traders is falling apart because someone threw a spanner in my well-oiled machine, and then a few more for good measure. If we do not remove these obstructions, the network will not recover. And all the resources and effort you have invested in my business will have gone down the drain."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタ自身の雅量のある言動の陶酔感が夢中になるほどでないって言うなら、もっとありふれてるけど、同じく重要な懸念を思い出させてやるよ。誰かがアタシのよく油を塗った機械にスパナーを投げ込んだから、アタシのコールド・トレーダーのネットワークは壊れつつある。それからさらに、何本かのスパナが念のために投げ込まれた。この障害物を取り除かない限り、ネットワークは回復しない。そして、アンタがアタシのビジネスに投資したすべてのリソースと労力は無駄になる」

languages.text: “如果慷慨大度的醉人感觉仍然不足以打动你的话，亲爱的，我得提醒你一件比较枯燥、但却依然重要的事情。我的冷市贸易网络正在分崩离析，因为有人往那台原本运行很顺畅的机器上扔了个扳手，随后又扔了几个。如果不消灭这些障碍，我的贸易网络就无法恢复，你在我生意上投入的所有资源与精力都会付诸东流。”
languages.original_text: "If the intoxicating feeling of your own magnanimity isn't enthralling enough, shereen, I will remind you of more mundane but no less significant concerns. My network of Cold Traders is falling apart because someone threw a spanner in my well-oiled machine, and then a few more for good measure. If we do not remove these obstructions, the network will not recover. And all the resources and effort you have invested in my business will have gone down the drain."

traits.locale_text: “如果慷慨大度的醉人感觉仍然不足以打动你的话，亲爱的，我得提醒你一件比较枯燥、但却依然重要的事情。我的冷市贸易网络正在分崩离析，因为有人往那台原本运行很顺畅的机器上扔了个扳手，随后又扔了几个。如果不消灭这些障碍，我的贸易网络就无法恢复，你在我生意上投入的所有资源与精力都会付诸东流。”

languages.text: «Por si la embriagadora energía de su propia magnanimidad no fuera lo bastante cautivadora, shereen, le recordaré preocupaciones más mundanas pero no por ello menos importantes. Mi red de Comerciantes Fríos se desmorona porque alguien ha saboteado mi tan bien engrasada máquina. Y lo ha hecho con gusto y repetidamente. Si no eliminamos dichas obstrucciones, la red seguirá en las mismas. Y todos los recursos y el esfuerzo que ha invertido en mi negocio se irán a tomar viento».
languages.original_text: "If the intoxicating feeling of your own magnanimity isn't enthralling enough, shereen, I will remind you of more mundane but no less significant concerns. My network of Cold Traders is falling apart because someone threw a spanner in my well-oiled machine, and then a few more for good measure. If we do not remove these obstructions, the network will not recover. And all the resources and effort you have invested in my business will have gone down the drain."

traits.locale_text: «Por si la embriagadora energía de su propia magnanimidad no fuera lo bastante cautivadora, shereen, le recordaré preocupaciones más mundanas pero no por ello menos importantes. Mi red de Comerciantes Fríos se desmorona porque alguien ha saboteado mi tan bien engrasada máquina. Y lo ha hecho con gusto y repetidamente. Si no eliminamos dichas obstrucciones, la red seguirá en las mismas. Y todos los recursos y el esfuerzo que ha invertido en mi negocio se irán a tomar viento».

languages.text: « Si jamais la sensation enivrante de votre magnanimité ne vous suffisait pas, j'aimerais rappeler à votre bon souvenir des préoccupations un peu plus terre à terre, shereen. Mon réseau de spécialistes du Commerce Froid périclite parce qu'un petit malin a décidé de jeter un grain de sable dans ses engrenages parfaitement huilés. Et pour faire bonne mesure, il y a ensuite versé le reste du seau. Si je ne nettoie pas tout ça, mon affaire ne remontera jamais la pente. Et toutes les ressources et les efforts que vous avez investis dans mon projet seront perdus à jamais. »
languages.original_text: "If the intoxicating feeling of your own magnanimity isn't enthralling enough, shereen, I will remind you of more mundane but no less significant concerns. My network of Cold Traders is falling apart because someone threw a spanner in my well-oiled machine, and then a few more for good measure. If we do not remove these obstructions, the network will not recover. And all the resources and effort you have invested in my business will have gone down the drain."

traits.locale_text: « Si jamais la sensation enivrante de votre magnanimité ne vous suffisait pas, j'aimerais rappeler à votre bon souvenir des préoccupations un peu plus terre à terre, shereen. Mon réseau de spécialistes du Commerce Froid périclite parce qu'un petit malin a décidé de jeter un grain de sable dans ses engrenages parfaitement huilés. Et pour faire bonne mesure, il y a ensuite versé le reste du seau. Si je ne nettoie pas tout ça, mon affaire ne remontera jamais la pente. Et toutes les ressources et les efforts que vous avez investis dans mon projet seront perdus à jamais. »

languages.text: "Wenn das berauschende Gefühl Eurer eigenen Großartigkeit nicht aufregend genug ist, Shereen, dann will ich Euch an profanere, aber nicht weniger bedeutsame Bedenken erinnern. Mein Netzwerk von Kalthändlern zerfällt, weil jemand einen Schraubenschlüssel in meine gut geölte Maschine geworfen hat, und dann gleich noch ein paar hinterher. Wenn wir diese Störfaktoren nicht entfernen, wird das Netzwerk sich nicht mehr erholen. Und dann gehen alle Ressourcen und Mühen, die Ihr in mein Geschäft investiert habt, den Bach runter."
languages.original_text: "If the intoxicating feeling of your own magnanimity isn't enthralling enough, shereen, I will remind you of more mundane but no less significant concerns. My network of Cold Traders is falling apart because someone threw a spanner in my well-oiled machine, and then a few more for good measure. If we do not remove these obstructions, the network will not recover. And all the resources and effort you have invested in my business will have gone down the drain."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das berauschende Gefühl Eurer eigenen Großartigkeit nicht aufregend genug ist, Shereen, dann will ich Euch an profanere, aber nicht weniger bedeutsame Bedenken erinnern. Mein Netzwerk von Kalthändlern zerfällt, weil jemand einen Schraubenschlüssel in meine gut geölte Maschine geworfen hat, und dann gleich noch ein paar hinterher. Wenn wir diese Störfaktoren nicht entfernen, wird das Netzwerk sich nicht mehr erholen. Und dann gehen alle Ressourcen und Mühen, die Ihr in mein Geschäft investiert habt, den Bach runter."

languages.text: "Kendi cömertliğinin dayanılmaz hafifliği yetmediyse şirinim, daha sıradan ama yine bir bu kadar önemli meseleleri de hatırlatmak isterim. Soğuk Tacir ağım dağılıyor, güzel güzel ilerlediğimiz yola bir değil, çok sayıda taş koyuldu. Bu engelleri kaldırmazsak bir daha belimizi doğrultamayacağız. Bu işe ayırdığın tüm kaynaklar, verdiğin onca emek çöpe gidecek."
languages.original_text: "If the intoxicating feeling of your own magnanimity isn't enthralling enough, shereen, I will remind you of more mundane but no less significant concerns. My network of Cold Traders is falling apart because someone threw a spanner in my well-oiled machine, and then a few more for good measure. If we do not remove these obstructions, the network will not recover. And all the resources and effort you have invested in my business will have gone down the drain."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi cömertliğinin dayanılmaz hafifliği yetmediyse şirinim, daha sıradan ama yine bir bu kadar önemli meseleleri de hatırlatmak isterim. Soğuk Tacir ağım dağılıyor, güzel güzel ilerlediğimiz yola bir değil, çok sayıda taş koyuldu. Bu engelleri kaldırmazsak bir daha belimizi doğrultamayacağız. Bu işe ayırdığın tüm kaynaklar, verdiğin onca emek çöpe gidecek."
